text.p: True or False: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is a [mathjaxinline]10\times 12[/mathjaxinline] matrix and [mathjaxinline]v \in \mathbb R^{10}[/mathjaxinline], and the equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] has infinitely many solutions, then the set of solutions to that equation forms a subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^{12}[/mathjaxinline].
